Name: Prin-Crest
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Defense and Special Defense. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Piplup, Prinplup, and Empoleon.  Swap a Prin-Foam and a Prin-Card for a Prin-Crest at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
